name: checkAddTheSameProAfterReset

statusDetails.message:
The following asserts failed:
	Product button is not avalible to re-add  after reset. expected [Add to cart] but found [Remove],
	Product is not re-added  after reset. expected [Remove] but found [Add to cart],
	Product is not re-added  after reset. expected [1] but found [0]
